content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmman724store.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-sysnapse-storage/raw-nyc-tax/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

-- Specify UTF-8 Collation for VARCHAR columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmman724store.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-sysnapse-storage/raw-nyc-tax/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]
